transferfunclist¶

Functions and classes for processing lists of transfer functions.

Classes¶

class darkhistory.spec.transferfunclist.TransferFuncList(tflist)¶

Bases: object

List of transfer functions.

Parameters:tflist (list of TransferFunction) – A list of transfer functions at various injection energies.
in_eng¶

ndarray – The injection energies of the transfer functions.

rs¶

ndarray – The redshift abscissa for all transfer functions.

dlnz¶

float – The d log(1+z) step for all transfer functions.

Table of Methods

at_rs(rs_arr) Returns the transfer functions at the new redshift abscissa.
at_rs(rs_arr)¶

Returns the transfer functions at the new redshift abscissa.

Parameters:rs_arr (ndarray) – The new redshift abscissa.
